required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Registry for Mitral Valve Surgery at Department of Cardiac Surgery University Hospital of Basel/ Switzerland
clinical_study.official_title: Registry for Mitral Valve Surgery at Department of Cardiac Surgery University Hospital of Basel/ Switzerland

brief_summary.textblock: A registry is installed to collect (pre-, intra- and postoperative) data on patients undergoing mitral valve surgery at the Department for Cardiac Surgery of Universit채tsspital Basel/ Switzerland since 2009. Retrospective data (since 2009) as well as prospective data are included in this ongoing registry to analyse the development of mitral valve surgery at the Department of Cardiac Surgery University Hospital of Basel/ Switzerland.

primary_outcome.measure: correlation between technique of mitral valve surgery and postoperative mitral valve pressure gradient
primary_outcome.description: correlation between technique of mitral valve surgery and postoperative mitral valve pressure gradient

intervention.description: pre-, intra- and postoperative data on patients undergoing mitral valve surgery at the Department for Cardiac Surgery of Universit채tsspital Basel/ Switzerland since 2009

study_pop.textblock: patients undergoing mitral valve surgery at the Department for Cardiac Surgery of Universit채tsspital Basel/ Switzerland since 2009

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients undergoing mitral valve surgery at the Department for Cardiac Surgery of Universit채tsspital Basel/ Switzerland since 2009
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients refusing consent for data use
